label: cascading_failure_01_ep_029
content:

### Alerts
- Alert Name: CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION

- Host: gateway-01
- Value: pool=primary events=22 waiting=150
- Alert Name: CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE
- Severity: critical
- Host: gateway-02
- Value: error_pct=2.71

### Deployments
- No deployments

### Events
- Feature flag 'skip-geo-on-timeout' set to 95% of traffic
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Vendor provided alternate geo endpoint host (DNS change prepared)
- Scaled checkout-worker pool from 12 to 14 instances

### On Call
- Shift: A. Chen. 9 pages. 3 tickets (DNS-77 geo endpoint, CO-940, POOL-689). Status: Mitigating.
